radiographic_examinations.findings: Focal, patchy opacification in the right lower lobe.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: High-resolution CT scan of the chest
radiographic_examinations.findings: Centrilobular emphysema at the apexes of the lungs; at the bases, small reticular opacities without gross consolidation.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Heavily calcified aneurysm of the infrarenal abdominal aorta measuring approximately 8 cm.
